parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the harmonic balancer can cause engine damage, smoke, and potentially lead to a loss of control or engine failure, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Smoke coming from underneath the hood

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the head gasket can cause oil leaks, engine damage, and potentially lead to a fire, which can increase the risk of accidents or injuries.

The failure of the timing belt tensioner can cause the timing belt to fail, leading to engine damage, bent valves, and potentially catastrophic engine failure, which can increase the risk of accidents or strand the driver.
The failure of the brake system can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: premature wear of brake pads and rotors.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Contamination of the brake fluid can cause brake system failure, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
Premature wear of brake components can cause brake system failure, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Premature wear of brake pads and rotors

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure to Inspect and Maintain Vehicle
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to inspect and maintain the vehicle can cause brake system failure, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
The failure of the steering belt can cause a loss of power steering assist, making it difficult to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Sudden loss of power steering assist
loss of control of the vehicle
failure of the pulley belt within the steering mechanism.
